text: Colomby-Anguerny is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Anguerny (the seat) and Colomby-sur-Thaon.Arrêté préfectoral 30 September 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Colomby-Anguerny
